questions.system_answer: I don’t have real‑time clock data, but Paris is in the Central European Time zone (UTC +2 hours during daylight‑saving time). So if it’s 12:00 UTC, it would be 14:00 in Paris. If you let me know the current UTC time, I can give you the exact time in Paris.
